title: Oops! I broke it... again 😅
subtitle: Our dev was confident this wouldn't crash. He was wrong. Very wrong.

title: Blame the developer 👨‍💻
subtitle: Yep, it's my fault. I thought pushing to main on a Friday was smart.

title: We deployed bugs, not features 🐛
subtitle: Please hold on while we pretend to fix things. It's mostly duct tape.

title: 404: Developer not found 😵
subtitle: The dev went out for coffee and never came back. So did the server.

title: Oopsie-daisy on production 🌪️
subtitle: That 'quick fix' turned into a full-blown disaster. Classic dev move.

title: The code ran perfectly… on my machine 🧠
subtitle: Too bad the server disagrees. We're negotiating.

title: Scheduled downtime (aka unplanned chaos) 🔧
subtitle: I swear it worked five minutes ago. Probably gremlins in the server.
